summary: Contoso Wireless offers three internet plans: a basic plan with 10GB of data and download speeds of up to 10 Mbps; an unlimited plan with unlimited data and download speeds of up to 25 Mbps; and a premium plan with unlimited data and download speeds of up to 100 Mbps. All plans include free installation and no contracts, and customers can get discounts for signing up for a long-term contract or bundling their services. Contoso Wireless also offers special deals and promotions, as well as 24/7 customer service support.
